name: mpl-koha-patch
title: MPL Koha Patch
description: LibLime Koha ILS modifications targeted to the staff of Madison Public Library
author: Lucas Schneider

preferences.name: skin
preferences.title: Select a display:
preferences.description: Determines the appearance of the extension

preferences.name: patronMsg
preferences.title: Additional Patron Messages
preferences.description: Replace several of LibLime's predefined patron messages with messages more often used by MPL circ

preferences.name: validAddr
preferences.title: Validate Madison Addresses
preferences.description: Alerts library staff when an unacceptable or restricted Madison address has been entered

preferences.name: autoUserId
preferences.title: Autofill OPAC Login Number
preferences.description: Autofill a patron's OPAC username to the value of their library card

preferences.name: selectPSTAT
preferences.title: Lookup PSTAT
preferences.description: Automatically lookup the census tract number and zipcode for a Madison address, if possible

preferences.name: forceDigest
preferences.title: Autoselect "Digests Only"
preferences.description: Automatically selects the "Digests Only" option (when available) while selecting patron notification options

preferences.name: middleName
preferences.title: Generate Middle Initials
preferences.description: Automatically generates a patron's middle initial from the first name field
